message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value, worth $10000 to you, and we believe it would significantly benefit your endeavors. Considering its quality and the importance it holds for you, we propose to offer it to you at a special price of $9500. We hope this proposal aligns with your expectations and allows us to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let us know. We look forward to your positive response.
